thread.title: Waldorf Astoria Hotels & Resorts Curates Bespoke Unforgettable Experiences at 25 Iconic Destinations Worldwide
thread.title_full: Waldorf Astoria Hotels & Resorts Curates Bespoke Unforgettable Experiences at 25 Iconic Destinations Worldwide

title: Waldorf Astoria Hotels & Resorts Curates Bespoke Unforgettable Experiences at 25 Iconic Destinations Worldwide
text:
Personalized linens, towels, and bath robes Full-day chartered helicopter ride over The Grand Canyon and Sedona Sunset history tour Chartered Hinckley boat to a private island for a special dinner and sunset experience Charter fishing experience on board a luxury yacht under the supervision of a notable local captain After-hours guided tour of the Hemingway Home and Museum, led by the museum’s curator Private sea plane flight from the Casa Marina pier for a half-day adventure to the Dry Tortugas – Fort Jefferson, which features a private tour, world-class snorkeling and a picnic Waldorf Astoria Chicago – Chicago, Illinois Private sailing lesson on Lake Michigan Private helicopter tour of Chicago’s skyline followed by a personal curated architecture tour by limo or a personal curated tour of Chicago’s infamous gangster-related historic landmarks Two great seats at one of Broadway in Chicago’s shows, a meet and greet with the cast, and a behind-the-scenes tour of the theatre Excursion to Culebra Island aboard the Motor Yacht Tarambana and for a day at Puerto Rico’s world-famous Flamenco Beach Play 18 holes of golf for two at an Arthur Mills-designed championship golf course Guided tour of the El Yunque Rain Forest Access to a 4-wheel drive Jeep Wrangler for the length of stay Sail to Molokini for a morning scuba and snorkeling experience Helicopter tour of Maui, culminating in a chef-prepared picnic lunch on the slopes of Mt. Haleakala Private sail boat charter sunset dinner experience Bentley upon arrival for your exclusive use over two days Private instruction for two at PGA West Golf Academy Round of golf for two on any of the five resort courses, including the famed TPC Stadium Course at PGA WEST Chauffeured tour of Joshua Tree National Park The Roosevelt, A Waldorf Astoria Hotel – New Orleans, Louisiana Experience antiques shopping along Royal Street culminating in a very special visit to world acclaimed M.S. Rau Antiques Evening of food and music first at Snug Harbor Jazz Bistro, followed by a tour of discovery on Frenchmen Street complete with VIP access to the venues Fishing in the Gulf of Mexico, an authentic alligator hunt, or a visit to the Wetlands of America Waldorf Astoria New York – New York City, New York Dinner underneath the New York City lights with dinner for two in Waldorf Astoria New York’s private rooftop garden Travel to a denim factory in SoHo for a tailored “made-to-order” denim experience Pre-theater dinner for two at the Central Park Boathouse Travel from the Boathouse to Columbus Circle in a horse-drawn carriage Broadway show in the Theater District with a private after show Q&A and meet and greet with the cast Exclusive VIP guided tour of one of the Walt Disney World Theme Parks Private cabana at the Waldorf Astoria Orlando pool Suite Life Bull & Bear Private Dining Experience – a culinary journey customized in the privacy of your suite; dessert will be planned to be served on the balcony, timed with the start of the evening fireworks at Epcot Range Rover airport transfer Meet with a Custom Ski Stylist at Cole Sport to prepare and gear-up for a mountain adventure Learn the history of the local whiskey distillery, High West, and enjoy dinner Private helicopter ski tour with PC Powder Cats Waldorf Astoria Panama – Panama City, Panama Private helicopter tour of the Panama Canal Explore the Old Colonial Panama City with a private tour Shopping at one of Panama City’s exclusive malls with a personal shopper and a special shopping card 
Europe & Middle East Dinner at Librije's Zusje Amsterdam, commissioned by Michelin three-star restaurant De Librije VIP access to the recently opened Rijksmuseum Private lunch on a classic canal boat Personal shopping tour through the KaDeWe, or Kaufhaus des Westens, the largest department store in continental Europe VIP visit to KPM, the Royal Porcelain Manufacturer, and a private tour of Museum Island Cooking course and dinner at Michelin-rated “Les Solistes by Pierre Gagnaire”
